quest.name: Sharing Is Caring
journal:
Uin Nee requires a new source of amusement.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter any phrase containing “snae ling” to charm the covetous pixie.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oh, how I tire of these same old toys of mine! If only I had something new and exciting to play with, oh, the wondrous dreams I could spin!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: How about those precious little treasures that those most vexing pixies over by the Bookman's Shelves have found? The ones they had the nerve to hoard all for themselves! Hmph!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: What sort of trinkets are they, you ask? How am I supposed to know? They won't so much as let me see them! But hmm...yes. Yes, indeed... Maybe if you, my favorite mortal, were to ask nicely─with a pretty, pretty please─they just might oblige! Yes, I do believe they might!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: You speak our tongue quite well, yes? All you need to do is tell them how [jumpingly cute] they are, and I'm sure they'll be singing a different tune in no time at all. Then once you have their treasures, you just trot them back here to me. Then everyone's happy, yes?

dialogue.name: COLLECTORPIXIE
dialogue.text: Well, well! If it isn't Uin Nee's favorite mortal! Forename, was it? Whatever brings you to... Wait, I know what this is!

dialogue.name: COLLECTORPIXIE
dialogue.text: If Uin Nee has sent you to get your hands on our treasures, well, then they can just flutter off whence they came! We found these, and that means we'll be keeping them, thank you very much!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase that contains the words “snae ling” to earn the favor of the covetous pixie.

dialogue.name: COLLECTORPIXIE
dialogue.text: Why, of all the─! Forename, you're making me blush!

dialogue.name: COLLECTORPIXIE
dialogue.text: Still, if you think that just because you're the hero who brought back the night, that you can just saunter in and charm us into sharing our treasures with you, then...come to think of it, you're right!

dialogue.name: COLLECTORPIXIE
dialogue.text: After all, why keep our precious possessions all for ourselves when they could be spun into dreams and bring joy to all the children in the realm. Oh, what a lovely thought that is! Just promise me you'll take care of it, yes?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oh! My favorite mortal is back! And what's that in your hands? Could it be!? Yes, yes, you must show me at once!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: What a lovely collection of insect wings! A brilliant wing that shines with all the colors of the rainbow, a fluffy wing covered with flaxen hair! Why, these would make beautiful hair ornaments for me and my friends!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Why, what a lovely bouquet! I don't believe I've ever seen blooms quite like these before. I would make a crown of flowers to adorn the heads of the dear children in dreams of pure blossoming bliss!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: A collection of stones...and just look at how round they are! Come to think of it, they resemble the eyes of those pesky, nasty Fuath. Perhaps I will simply throw them as far as─oh, but I mustn't waste them so. I will polish them into a charming set of marbles for the children!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Those greedy little pixies were most smitten when you told them how [jumpingly cute] they were, were they not? I thought they might be! You know, you could tell me the same from time to time if you'd like. Tee hee!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: But where was I? Oh, yes. I'm sure that they'll be all too quick to hoard and hide away the next shiny little thing they get their hands on, so I do hope you're ready to charm them again for me. Farewell for now, my favorite mortal!
